website_summaries.verdict: Able to make fast prints from almost any smartphone or tablet over a convenient WiFi connection.
pros: Includes an app that allows you to make minor editing changes to your photos before you print them
Portable printer is no bigger than a large smartphone, making it easy to carry anywhere
Very simple system that uses proprietary printing cartridges
cons: Only can make up to 25 prints from a single battery charge

website_summaries.verdict: Truly pocket-sized, portable printer for iPhones that prints tiny but mighty good quality photos.
pros: Printer wirelessly connects to your iPhone and does not need to connect data for convenient, on-the-go printing
3.5” x 2” photos come out impressively clear and on high quality paper with protective coating
Can customize pictures with borders or text
cons: Uses about 10% battery power per picture, so try to be close to a power outlet when using
Replacing cartridges is expensive and can be difficult to find

customer_reviews.title: Convenient way to print pics from your phone!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a shared gift for my 3 children for Christmas. I chose it because of the good reviews it had gotten from other amazon customers. After using it the first few times I just say I’m impressed. It prints good quality prints with a protective coating on them. I especially like the fact that you can edit the photos and add text to them. The kids all love printing from their phones as well. I highly recommend this printer!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: This is the printer to have for travel journals, scrapbooking, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding printer, easy to use, quick set up and very intuitive. I can't recommend this enough. After trying other printers this is the first one that I am thrilled with. At last I have found THE printer. Yes...it's a bit slow but for the quality of the photo it can't be beat. Power on, set my phone on top (Samsung Note 8) couple taps of the screen and tada....photo. Did I mention I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended! Amazing print quality!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is amazing! Uses about 10% battery power per picture, so used while plugged in or close to power! Picture quality is amazing with all kinds of borders and templates to customize your photos! Easy setup! Easy refilling with photo paper cartridges! App download: quick and easy to find! I am extremely happy with this purchase and the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keri Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool!
customer_reviews.text: This product is actually really neat and I like ti a lot, the only reason it isnt 5 stars is because the image quality isnt exactly perfect, but also what can you expect from a portable pocket sized printer! overall its a really cool product and I would recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Marylou

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for the wife and product performs very well. Photos are small but very clear and color is good. Set up was straight forward and extremely easy. Nice option if you like wallet size photos from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Goebel

customer_reviews.title: DH Loved His Birthday Present
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my DH's birthday. He's kind of a 'gadget' kind of guy, so I thought this would be fun, rather than another tool gadget. It was fairly easy to set-up (he doesn't have a whole lot of patience for setting up things), and printed a couple of pictures without any problem. We both liked that they are wallet size pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Sue M.

customer_reviews.title: I love the printer and I think it is cool to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the printer and I think it is cool to be able to print out pictures directly from your phone. The only downside is that it is expensive to keep buying cartridges for the printers when I could get pictures printed for cheaper through a CVS or Walgreens but otherwise I think the printer is a really cool product to have
customer_reviews.author: Deborah N.

customer_reviews.title: It's portable
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this for Christmas and I love it. It will be really great while we are traveling and I want to leave photos with friends and family instead of mailing them after we return home. What a great Christmas present! Thank you again Gary, Love you Char Kelso
customer_reviews.author: Gary Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! The paper for the photos is here ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! The paper for the photos is here on amazon. Makes sense this is where you would buy it since this is where you’re getting the printer. Small cute and definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated - no printer cartridges anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool. My daughter loves it, and loves bringing it to school to print pictures on the spot. UPDATE: Printer cartridges literally not available anywhere. No updates, all backorder with no status. If you want to pay $100 for a crappy little printer and print your 10 small pictures while you wait months for a new cartridge - have at it. Plus even though they tell you if you write a review for them, they will send you a cartridge, that hasn't happened either.
customer_reviews.author: G. Merrick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is amazing. The step up took very little time and it was no hassle at all. Perfect for when I'm traveling or at an event with friends and family. The wireless printing capabilities are another plus!
customer_reviews.author: Embenn

customer_reviews.title: It really is very easy to print pictures from
customer_reviews.text: After having our daughter, I bought this printer for the convenience of printing pictures whenever I wanted, otherwise I would never get around to it! It really is very easy to print pictures from. The prints do come out a bit darker and grainier than if you were to get them printed through a traditional in-store printer but for the convenience and price point, I am still very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Tang

customer_reviews.title: good size, quality prints, fast, and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter, so this is her review: It's a good size, cute and small. Good quality photos perfect for your wallet or cell phone case. Fast printing and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered it as a gift for my daughter-in-law who ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it as a gift for my daughter-in-law who has a Samsung Galaxy. She opened the box and plugged it in and within a small amount of time, it was connected to her phone and printing. The pictures are clear, but small so if you need normal sized pictures, this is not the printer for you. If you have no size constraints, then this is ideal to print pictures from your phone. We have not tried it yet with an Iphone
customer_reviews.author: Diane Heaton

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest. I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest. I love it. Use it to print new employee photos. Fast, easy and the color is true to life. I just take a picture with my IPhone, go to the app and print the picture. The pictures are small but I don't need the standard 4 X 6 inch. The size is perfect for me. Price is very reasonable too. The cost of the paper is pricey at this time, about $2.00 per print but you aren't paying for the ink in your standard printer or messing with changing out the paper in that printer. This set up is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori W.

customer_reviews.title: Works better with iPhone 6 than Samsung 9
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little printer! The setup with the iPhone was a breeze. And given its size and the fact that it's not a full inkjet or laser printer, the pictures are great! So why the 4 stars? My best pictures are in my Samsung 9 and with all the NFC settings on, linking to the device takes forever and is pretty unreliable. I'm persistent so made it work... Grab some wine if you know what I mean or stick it out with the iPhone. Compared to these Polaroid cams... It's 5 stars better tho.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie S.

customer_reviews.title: Overall Very Easy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this printer for our daughter. So far no complaints. Easy setup. Pics are great. It is very convientent.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY this product!
customer_reviews.text: Warning: you can't find the cartridge for this printer anywhere on the internet! Do not buy this printer! I'm out 119.00 and have no more cartridges and only 10 pictures for that price!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Good, but slightly hard to use
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, very light, and portable. The printer itself is pretty straightforward, but the app lags a lot and is pretty difficult to use. Upon startup, if you're not connected to the printer, and click the "gallery" button, it freezes and you have to restart the app. Also, it's difficult to edit and crop the photo through the app, so I would recommend just doing that in the "photos" app. Generally, like I said before, the app lags a lot and caused me to make quite a few mistakes...Overall though, I like the pictures that come out, they look very good and are good quality relative to the price of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gili Keshet-Aspitz

customer_reviews.title: Holy Crap!
customer_reviews.text: This is so great. It took me a little while to figure it out; plus the writing on the literature is very small, especially if you are mature. But it works great. I'm looking forward to playing around with it, but it's perfect if you have grandchildren and/or cats.
customer_reviews.author: maggielicious

customer_reviews.title: the printer was amazing, the picture are clear and the color is ...
customer_reviews.text: the printer was amazing, the picture are clear and the color is great, great little printer for the money. love it.
customer_reviews.author: julia payne

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Love it - easy to set up in just a few minutes and very easy to use. Just started using it and it's all that I expected and wanted.
customer_reviews.author: andy a.

customer_reviews.title: great portable printer
customer_reviews.text: was always in need for a small little portable printer for my smart phone images, it prints good quality and the app works perfect but I wish they would make a carrying bag for this unit
customer_reviews.author: Gear Pro

customer_reviews.title: Very poor support.
customer_reviews.text: Support wants me to pone? I assume pry the door off or open. They know nothing about the product except what they scan out of the poorly written manual that you have already read in detail before chatting with them. This review is for the "support" and not for the product. This is a gift for someone else and I spent 35 minutes getting wrong instructions from "support".
customer_reviews.author: PtLGrnl

customer_reviews.title: Very upset.!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I printed a few "3" pictures were printed I needed more paper. It was very difficult to remove the Cartridge & even more difficult to replace it. I kept trying to replace with a Polaroid ZINK PAPER. That I purchased at the time of purchasing the printer (30 pack). tried putting in the packet of 10 as instructed, very difficult getting the paper in. I tied putting in only 8 instead of the packet of 10 as instructed, Thought it would be easier....it wasn't!!!!! Finally got it in with much difficulty Tried to print another picture, then the app said to replace the paper again. COULD NOT REMOVE THE CARTRIDGE!!!!!! VERY DISSAPOINTED AND UPSET TITH THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey E. Milstein

customer_reviews.title: So far very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: So far very happy with this, haven't run out of paper yet, only printed about 5 pics, I do notice a bit of a reddish hue on the photo's so need to add a bit more blue to get it to look more natural but this is probably the paper rather than the printer, I have also purchased this paper  I will test if it's compatible when I run out of paper and update my post
customer_reviews.author: Xav

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with Android!!!
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT work on Google Pixel Android as advertised. First the app is only available in Korean, and second, it just will not connect to the printer via WiFi or NFC as advertised. It’s fine with an iPhone, but NOT for Android. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: 3eagles

customer_reviews.title: Loved this printer but can’t get proper cartridges that work
customer_reviews.text: Loved this printer but can’t get proper cartridges that work. The cartridges that came with the printer were great, but I reordered new cartridges and they don’t work. No luck with seller to get replacements. Printer no good without cartridges
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Goldmeier

customer_reviews.title: Gave to teen daughter for Christmas, she loves the instant pictures from her phone
customer_reviews.text: What a great gift this was! I wanted to get something thoughtful that would allow for many "instant gratification" moments and smiles. This was perfect and the price was great. Luckily I also found the printing cartridges at a great price so I could a small bunch to allow our teen to snap and print as many pictures of friends as her heart desires! She was pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Christa A. Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with a Samsung Galaxy s10+
customer_reviews.text: I did finally get it to work on my Samsung Galaxy s9+, but the cartridge ink sheet had jammed inside the printer and was unable to be removed without ripping it. The picture I had tried to print came out yellow. Luckily I didn't put one of my newly purchased cartridges in to try until I gave it back to my daughter in law, who has an s10+. The app displayed a message right away that it may not work properly on this phone. That proved to be correct, wish I'd known before I bought this for her for Christmas. Very frustrating. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: njhorsemom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly great quality printing. Photo came out clear and glossy. Very little sound coming out from unit. Easy set up and love that there is no mess with separate ink cartridges. Only downside is that the cartridges are a bit on the pricey side, and they seem to be out of stock for a lot of the buying options, but for ease and quality I am just complaining a little bit. Can’t wait to take it with me on vacations, events for easy photo printing
customer_reviews.author: Osmin Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: WORTH MORE THAN IT COSTS!!! <3<3
customer_reviews.text: I've spent thousands of hours and hundreds of dollars looking for a goo cell phone printer and THIS ONE IS THE BEST..PERIOD!! Easy setup & usage, plus the color is FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Get a full charge on this printer before you do the setup.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this portable printer as a Christmas gift for my wife. When she is with friends and takes pictures, she said it would be nice to be able to print one and share. Well voila, this little printer allows that and was pretty easy for her to set up and connect with her IPhone 7. She is very happy with it and the quality of the 2X3 photos it produces.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Harman

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive Photo Printer!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent photo printer for my daughter's iPhone 6S. Setup is easy once you realize that the USB charger needs to connect to a computer, not a wall outlet. Download the Pickit Printer app, log onto the printer's Wi-Fi, and then it's ready to print high quality photos. Impressive.
customer_reviews.author: L. Trotman

customer_reviews.title: A hit for any photographer using an iPhone or android.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my hubby for Father's Day - and it was a big hit!! He just loves it, and we are using the printer quite often. My husband was a fan of the polaroid, even though he has some very expensive photographic equipment, so I had a premonition he would enjoy this printer - and I was right! It works beautifully, and the resolution of the prints is terrific. So happy I got this for him!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great the only thing I didn’t know is that Even if you order more film you’ll still need new cartridges to put inside. I also didn’t like that the instructions weren’t the greatest on how to put a new cartridge in.
customer_reviews.author: H.T

customer_reviews.title: Really poor quality of photos. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The photos are very blurry. I think home printers in the 90s produced sharper photos than this one. The battery drains really fast even when not in use. Phone app is really slow. The only redeeming quality is that it's compact. But overall was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Korovina

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Never knew this existed until my daughter asked for one at Christmas. This is actually a great little printer! Picture quality is not too bad for what you pay for. It is neat watching the printing process of this printer. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my mini printer
customer_reviews.text: I love my mini printer. It makes excellent little prints from phone photos. It is small and easy to transport. Love it! ❤
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Oanes

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't stay synced to phone and app. Battery drains extremely fast
customer_reviews.text: The printer seemed really cool but with its constant un-pairing and quick battery drain, it's not efficient at all. I thought I could get away with using this at an small event but it's not worth it. I literally sat and tried and retried to sync it to my phone after taking pictures for 25 mins, turning both the app and printer on and off multiple times. I will be returning. Even for personal use I couldn't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Fuerte

customer_reviews.title: I love that is wireless
customer_reviews.text: This product has so much potential. I love that is wireless. However, it turns off too fast and you have to reconnect it directly through Wi-Fi every time you take a picture. However the pictures turn out really well
customer_reviews.author: TexasT

customer_reviews.title: Never used it. Looked like the picture though
customer_reviews.text: Looked good before I returned it, I didn’t mean to order it so can’t say how the quality is but amazon wants me to review anyways. It’s been in my inbox a lot over the years asking me to review, so here it is.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: It's not a bad product but the build quality is very poor
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad product but the build quality is very poor. Sidepanel which is deattachable broke during the first week.
customer_reviews.author: Omer Masood

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! App is no longer active
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it, it worked fine besides having some pairing issues. 2 months later, I noticed that my phones wasn't connecting through the app. I deleted the app so I can reinstall it but when I went to go reinstall it it was no longer to be found.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Wished it worked better.
customer_reviews.text: This was very difficult to use. In fact, I was never able to get a photo to print even after spending a great deal of time following the directions and looking on-line for help.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great printer for your iPhone
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. Small and quiet. When you download the Apple app make sure you use the Pickit Sticker, not the other one since it currently crashes every time. Pickit Sticker works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard W. White

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This little box is amazing! It took a moment to understand setup, but after that it was intuitive and a breeze. Really nice thing to have for impromptu printing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristiofca

customer_reviews.title: Portable Fun
customer_reviews.text: Cute, portable printer. I bought it for a baby shower I hosted where we replaced games with craft making. We were able to create an instant scrapbook and memories with this tiny little printer.
customer_reviews.author: yoly

customer_reviews.title: Short Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are the quality I expected for a quick print. Easy to use, but very short battery life and constantly need to reconnect it to my phone.
customer_reviews.author: dlschrei

customer_reviews.title: Loving this printer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't wanting to deal with the ink cartridges...but after comparing and reading a ton of reviews, I'm glad I chose this guy. The pics come out so much clearer than the inkless instant printers. Totally worth it!! Loving it so far!
customer_reviews.author: M Hope

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Love pictures
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Love pictures. Just wish I knew it came out and went in 3x before it's done because I almost ripped it off early.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Fun on the go pix!
customer_reviews.text: Really cool product---I plan to use at my daughter's birthday party. I will print pictures at the party and give the guests. Much better quality than the Polaroid my daughter has. Initially I had some trouble with the app but I downloaded the pic stick app and that worked without a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: Juie V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use with an iphone
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to carry device. Trying it out went smooth before I'll take it with me on holiday. I hope it will continue to function as it is now.
customer_reviews.author: Filip Pattyn

customer_reviews.title: Best ive seen
customer_reviews.text: No instruction but print quality 5 star. Best ive seen.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: No cartridge replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I've returned this item, I had a very difficult time finding replacement cartridges and the operating instructions we not up to my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Arrived in perfect timing and my daughter in law loves it!! Will use this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Q

customer_reviews.title: Good printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a vary good printer. It is small and easy carry. If fact you can carry it in your pocket. The price was vary reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L. Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Love this, finally a non-cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: Love this, finally a non-cumbersome, usb right to the phone or ipad way to print pics. We got this for our 6-yr old granddaughter. She's got pics pasted everywhere in her room.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works well great idea Only one issue is that these are small picture prints
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery J. Napodano

customer_reviews.title: Love it. But the cartridges run out so quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. But the cartridges run out so quickly something I overlooked when buying. Seller was great and my delivery came so quickly I would definitely buy from the seller again. Be wary you should buy additional cartridges as well if purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Its OK, its a neat gift
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price but the machine is loud and takes a while to print. Very compact but great as a gift idea. Wish they made a larger 4x6 size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer!
customer_reviews.text: Great little printer for sending photos to grandparents! Reminds me of old Poloroids. Fairly good quality of prints for such a tiny machine. I have an iPhone and the app was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Tawny Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It was super easy to setup and it prints pictures quickly and ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this printer as a Xmas gift for my dad and he loves it! It was super easy to setup and it prints pictures quickly and with great detail. My dad loves taking pictures and now he can print out any photo from his phone he wants anytime! It is also a great size, making it very portable. The photos it prints out are about the size of a credit card which is perfect. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Brian from North Texas

customer_reviews.title: Good value and performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Have not had it long enough for five stars, but so far the pictures are printed quickly and they are very sharp and digital quality. Would recomend
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it as you can't get the refill cartridges for it anywhere. Maybe the manufacturer is out of business? Crazy that Amazon still has this for sale.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Doug

customer_reviews.title: Reccommended
customer_reviews.text: Compact design, easy to set up / start up. Prints great quality images, and I love that I now have a quick way to pop out photos of the family. Works well to print pictures that will fit in all of those little 2" by 3" frames. Looking forward to getting lots of use from this!
customer_reviews.author: RescueMom

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great little printer Easy to set up with the app
customer_reviews.author: ZJM4eva

customer_reviews.title: Great teen gift
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use from the app for my 13 y/o daughter. She loves to print her favorite pictures from her iPhone to add to her wall. Prints out pics the same size as her Fugi insta camera
customer_reviews.author: Dianah K Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller!!
customer_reviews.text: There was a slight mixup with the shipping of this product. The seller resolved the issue quickly and thoroughly. We LOVE this printer! It is so, small, easy to use and prints excellent quality pictures! I highly recommend this product and seller!
customer_reviews.author: ERH0602

customer_reviews.title: First attempt
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy to install. There was a little difficulty in getting the first prints done. After working with it for a short time the prints were made and came out very nicely. The are sharp and the colors are true. I am sure I will be enjoying it for a long time. I am using i with my Samsung 8S.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Neat photo printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas, she enjoys printing photos easily from her phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Instant gratification
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Instant gratification. What more can you ask. The colors are great. My grandchildren had a great time printing out pictures they wanted. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work at all. Bought it for my boyfriend's birthday a couple months in advance by the time I gave it to him the warranty had expired. Makes a lot of noise but doesn't print. Just shuts off. Wasted 3 cartridges already. Spent money on replacement cartridges for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: E.E.S.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks!! It gives you a password of 12345678 and then tells you it’s an incorrect password! Nothing you can do and you can’t connect to it or print any pictures! Total waste of money!! DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Very good reproduction Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The ease of operation! The setup is quick and easy and again, the quality is excellent! *****
customer_reviews.author: Big Mick

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my 14 yr old granddaughter. Had checked out several printers before deciding on this one . This had good reviews so bought this one with fingers crossed ! So glad I did she loves it ! Easy to use & prints great pictures
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made get cartridges with printer
customer_reviews.text: Uses special cartridges. Go all in with a good product or use standard 8.5 x 11 or Kodak picture paper on a WiFi or wireless printer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kenneth G Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them! They are easy to use and good ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for Christmas gifts. Kids loved them! They are easy to use and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie lejune

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I sent this as a gift and supposedly they like it.
customer_reviews.author: susie r

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Woukd give it 5 stars but it is very difficult to find the photo cartridges!
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: This little printer is pretty cool did not know until i tried it
customer_reviews.text: This little printer is pretty cool did not know until i tried it, the quality is awesome and the charging doesnt take that long and my girlfriend loves it i think she is about to burn through the third replacement haha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Find a different one and save yourself an ulcer trying to get it to work.
customer_reviews.text: Works only for certain formatted photos. And you'll have to guess whether or not it's going to work. What's displayed on the app isn't necessarily what you're going to get printed out. The app is glitchy because the border option changes the resize, and the resize changes the border option.. very disappointing and frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: David Tran

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: It's really easy to use and an overall amazing product. The picture quality is also great.. I would recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Shivani panse

customer_reviews.title: Junk...Did not last three months
customer_reviews.text: The first time I went to replace the cartridge, the printer jammed. I called and got a replacement and it also jammed. I would go with a higher quality so you are not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing portable printer.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my gfs birthday. She was asking for a portable printer i bought the wrong one of course but it turned it great. This portable printer is amazing , gives colorful and amazing wallet sized pictures. Could not be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elieser Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: I love it :)
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient for the job that I do. I love this! It works and prints great photos. Super cute for presents as well or for the fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Only got 1 picture to print. It was a quality photo but the print cartridge failed after first pic. Thanks to Amazon for the rapid refund so I could buy different printer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first. Used a handful of times and it worked. Then it just stopped. Would love to return and get a replacement. But the company said it was bought too long ago. Bought it December 2016 but did not use it till August 2017. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CANDACE ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Great little gizmo!
customer_reviews.text: I was considering getting a Polaroid camera and decided on this mobile printer instead. It's very easy to use and the small pictures are adorable. You can edit them with the app and even add stickers and text. My kids think it's great!
customer_reviews.author: IRONDUKE

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok if you going to give someone a momentum to remember the event.
customer_reviews.author: alfonso sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Fun, portable, and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great portable printer for the times you want to just share a moment. This made a cute, fun gift for my wife. Instead of sending out photos or using desktop printers, we can get a relatively inexpensive print from our phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift for a shutter bug Daughter
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter as a Christmas gift. I know shes gonna love this. Thanks a million. I am excited to see her face when she gets this.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Olson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. You can connect the printer to your computer and download the apt. to your phone and you can print your pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Ltl Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Little Printer
customer_reviews.text: Great product, produces perfect pictures. It took a little over an hour to charge the battery but once that was done everything else was pretty straightforward. The app that you need for your device (Android for me) is decent and connecting to the printer is pretty easy. So far we've been having fun with this printer and look forward to taking it with us on family events.
customer_reviews.author: SMPlante

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Caught fire and melted after only 3 uses. Sent back to the company and they have not responded back to any correspondence. I would give 0 stars if that was an option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son he loved it. Pictures are small but they turn out really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Karen G.

customer_reviews.title: This was my 13 year old's favorite present for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: This was my 13 year old's favorite present for Christmas! It really is pretty cool and the pictures are clear and a decent size. I also bought a corkboard for her room for her to hang all the pics she prints out. Awesome product :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! So nice to have real pics again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Redden

customer_reviews.title: Why havent you bought this yet?
customer_reviews.text: Im still mesmerized how amazing this printer is. I love the compact size and amazing quality of the photos. The one thing i dont like though is i was the film only had 9 rather than 10 . Other than that hands down best device ever!
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: I am totally amazed by the simplicity and the great quality of the ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! This is the coolest gadget EVER!!! I am not tech savvy, and I was apprehensive about ordering it. However, I am totally amazed by the simplicity and the great quality of the pics! Definitely 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jh

product_meta.title: Portable Instant Mobile Photo Printer - Wireless Color Picture Printing from Apple iPhone, iPad or Android Smartphone Camera - Mini Compact Pocket Size Easy for Travel - SereneLife PICKIT20 White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteIntroducing our SereneLife PICKIT20 - a portable instant photo printer designed for any iPhone, iPad or Android smartphone! This portable printer is very simple to use, Just like having a Polaroid camera. Download the free PICKIT mobile app to make quick edits then using Wi-Fi, wirelessly transfer images from your smartphone camera roll or from social media sites like Instagram or Facebook to this small compact mobile printer.. After an hour and a half of charging time The portable photo printer is ready to go with you wherever your day may lead. A single charge will give you about 25 printed photos before you need to plug it back in. Very convenient to use Compared to other photo printers. Easy change 10 piece cartridges are disposable and convenient! Purchase replacements by searching PRTPICKET22. Your smartphone’s camera is convenient - but nothing can replace a tangible photo that you can touch hold or stick on your kitchen refrigerator. Our PICKIT mini printer does not compromise any photo quality, even though it is pocket size. Pictures are high quality, 2.1” x 3.4” prints are full color and borderless. The paper is coated and thick just like a classic photo and are designed to last! Specs: battery: 620mAh lithium power Product Dimensions: 6.2” x 3.2” x 1” Weight: 1.01 lbs. This mobile wireless printer is compatible to the following devices: Apple iPhone 7, 7 Plus, 6, 6 Plus, 6S, 6S Plus, 5, 5S, 4, 4S etc. Samsung Galaxy S6, S5, S5 edge, S4, S3 etc.
feature_bullets: Instantly print from smartphones: Connects with all Apple iPhone 4S, 5, 6, 7 and later, iPad, Android smartphones and tablets. Wirelessly transfer pictures using the printer’s fast Wi-Fi and Print in an instant. Does not need to connect to DSL or 4G data.

Portable design: This portable printer is comes with a built in battery that lets you take it anywhere. Print up to 25 images on a single charge. Compact mini size fits in your bag or pocket for Travel.

No paper no ink: Inkless self contained cartridges contain both paper and ink, enough for 10 prints. Easy to change. No fingerprints or hassle with Cleaning and maintenance. When the cartridge is depleted simply eject it from the printer and replace with a new one.
Color & compatibility: This mobile phone printer produces high quality fully laminated 291dpi glossy images. Prints are 2” x 3.5” and completely borderless. Ideal for quick card and ID prints.

Pickit mobile app: to use this mobile printer, download the PICKIT app and choose digital photos from your camera roll. Make quick small edits by cropping, changing color or adding filters before sending to the iPhone printer. Make collages with multiple pictures or add sticker and text to spice up pictures.
